ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I'm not sure exactly how to summarize this course. There were many different themes. I would recommend this course.

In this course one learns about basics of social psychology, about situationism, moral responsibility, racism, sexism, subcultures and so much more. I highly recommend this course for everybody who wants to learn something about humans and the things they struggle with - and everybody who does not care about this, should take this course, so he or she will care.
I would summarize it as moral reflection upon the results of recent social psychology. I would highly recommend it.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It definitely deepened my interest in and knowledge of the discipline. I am not sure yet exactly what impact it will have on my research, but I expect it to be substantial. It introduced me to a new set of questions and topics that I know consider very important.
